message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value, but I'm confident that this product offers even more potential than that.  How about we meet in the middle at $910,000? This reflects my willingness to negotiate while still recognizing the true worth of what I'm offering.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $850,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so how about we try $900,000?
